snippet: Jets coach Todd Bowles says he will "have a conversation" with defensive lineman Sheldon Richardson about a pregame video that contains several expletives....
lead_paragraph: Jets coach Todd Bowles says he will "have a conversation" with defensive lineman Sheldon Richardson about a pregame video that contains several expletives.

headline.main: Bowles to Talk to Richardson About Profanity-Filled Video
headline.print_headline: Bowles to Talk to Richardson About Profanity-Filled Video
